title: AIMA Developpement
p1: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we inform you that we collect and use your personal data only for the purpose of using our contact form. The collected data includes your name and email address.
p2: We also use the language of your device to translate our website into the appropriate language.
p3: We do not collect any other personal information and we do not use cookies.
p4: Your personal data is treated confidentially and is not shared with third parties without your explicit consent.
p5: Furthermore, your data is encrypted using the SHA256 algorithm to provide additional protection.
p6: If you have any questions or concerns regarding the protection of your personal data, please contact us using the contact details located in the footer.
